summary: Patched some security vulnerabilities and added AI provider selection and live pricing to the domain search tool. Also swapped in some new fonts and tidied up the mobile UI for the searcher.

features: add IBM Plex Mono and Bodoni Moda fonts
include static fonts in npm package
add Quicksand font and update TODOS with worker status
centralize config, update models to 4.5, wire up worker
add cancel search button and endpoint
integrate enhanced domain tool with Durable Objects + live pricing
add SSE streaming + enhanced evaluation display
add AI provider selection to search UI
add job sync from worker D1 index
fixes: remove explicit pnpm version to fix deployment
remove invalid wrangler pages deploy flags
surface Resend API errors instead of swallowing them
switch from Georgia to system sans-serif font stack
fix job ID mismatch in search start endpoint
use INSERT OR REPLACE and add error handling
polish mobile UI for domain searcher results
use Quicksand font consistently across all text
convert WOFF2 fonts to TTF for consistency
docs: update TODOS with completed domain worker integration
update TODOS with AI provider selection and job tracking bug
update README with current project state
